Auction posted at the PC, but feel free to bid here.

Delivery to Landing or FWI preferred. Buyout offers welcome.

The enhancives do not have level requirements, but of course you need to be level 13 to hold the dagger.

enruned mithril dagger The dagger's small pommel is worked into the form of a slit-pupiled eye. You see nothing unusual, except for a small enchanter's glyph. There appears to be something written on it.

Spidery letters etched into the base of the dagger's blade read, "One to distract, another in the back."

+25 Less than 1 lb

The dagger resonates with your voice, indicating that it enhances its owner in the following ways: It provides a bonus of 2 to Logic. It provides a bonus of 4 to Logic Bonus. The dagger looks to have more than your average giantman could count charges remaining.

MB: 1m CB: Sold on buyout
